website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a solid ultraviolet sanitizer but don't want to pay too much will love this budget model.
pros: Fits all types and sizes of shoes
Company offers full refund within in 90 days of purchase
cons: Some complained that their unit broke down in less than six months

customer_reviews.title: Work just as well as expensive UV lights
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great! Had them for a few weeks now and have used them for all shoes in my house. I’ve have had no problems at all. Got these instead of some that a doctor recommended for clearing shoes of fungus. The recommended ones were $150, which seemed a little over the top. And since these work fine, I’m glad I got them instead of the pricy ones.
customer_reviews.author: CFS

customer_reviews.title: Not even had it a week yet but it seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: I just have to assume it's killing fungi and bacteria since i can't see any dead cooties laying in my shoes. But after an hour it didn't completely erase the odor from my boxing shoes or my daily running shoes. They're definitely less smelly just not odor-free. If it doesn't do its job or breaks down I'll come back and update. But so far, so good...
customer_reviews.author: CJ Green

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging but great product
customer_reviews.text: One thing for sure. Very fragile. I could see why people were complaining about being broken when it has been shipped. Now to the 'pro' side. Magic! Not only odor has been gone, my feet seems to be in a better condition even without using any medication or foot care products. Super recommending if you are office workers or in any career where you need to where your shoe for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really regret buying this shoe sanitizer. It worked great for a short period of time, but two months after the initial purchase it has stopped working. I would highly recommend spending the money on a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: So far, okay?
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a weird plug-in setup. Have only used it once. Got it for my boyfriend who says his feet sweat like crazy. We’ll see what he says after using it some more with his workout shoes. He seems cautiously optimistic, but thinks the foot deodorizer sprays I got him will be more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Not “Exactly” as Described
customer_reviews.text: The item fees cheaply made. The ON/OFF switch doesn’t “actually” turn the lights on—it WILL turn the lights off. There is no 1-hour timer as was stated in the description I read. There is only a 15-minute and 30-minute time on the product. I have tried the product twice. It seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Schnellenberger

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long these are supposed to be left in shoes to achieve desired results, but the max you can set them for at a time is 30 minutes. I reset them every 30 minutes for 4 hours and smelled no difference in my tennis shoes. Maybe you're supposed to keep resetting them for 24 hours or something but either that's a ridiculous requirement or they just don't work. Either way, I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: M Starr

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I use the sterilizer to help prevent toenail fungus. There's no real way to know if it's working for that purpose, but the unit is functional (i.e. lights come one as intended, etc.) and was much less $ than the previous sterilizer I'd been using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bulb protective covers allow for more of the light to shine thru unlike other brand. It's a small buld so for closet and car spaces this one the best. Works well
customer_reviews.author: skyplanemd11

customer_reviews.title: Great desensitizing for Mom shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and One as a gift for My Mom My Mom likes it so much Great product Arrived on time Package well made Thank you
customer_reviews.author: trini

customer_reviews.title: This works WAY better than the one 4x's the price.
customer_reviews.text: This worked way way better than expected, and also way better than the Steri-shoe plus. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just buy new shoes
customer_reviews.text: Simply does not work, cheaply made to the point i wasn't comfortable plugging it into and outlet
customer_reviews.author: benjamin graves

customer_reviews.title: Received Quickly and Good Product
customer_reviews.text: THe product is good for travel because it works on multiple voltages. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: My son's feet stank so bad, we couldn't be in the same room as him when he removed his shoes. He's on medication now, but his shoes stick stank. This has definitely helped the situation.
customer_reviews.author: C. B

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok.. now just randomly dead.
customer_reviews.text: I assume it worked... light would turn on and I assume it was doing its job. I just plugged the unit in, and now neither bulb will light up. I see product info that says 1 year warranty but no info on how to take advantage of that, as I have only had this since March.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yotz

customer_reviews.title: Good for small shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Helps with drying my toddlers shoes when he play in puddles!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Pascascio

customer_reviews.title: Best. Mom. Hack. EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can now breathe within 5 feet of my teenagers lacrosse gloves, basketball shoes and favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher2

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well after I played with it and got itto work.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A. Delloye

customer_reviews.title: Blinded by the light
customer_reviews.text: Great product for this. Just plug it in and leave overnite. Shoes are fresh by the am
customer_reviews.author: Allie Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this product is easy to use and does a great job. Impressed with it and recommended to me by my doctor
customer_reviews.author: Xman618

feature_bullets: Deodorize your footware- Removes dampness and sweat from your shoes, gloves, eliminate bad odor.
Heat resistant tough surface: smooth finishing touch, resistant to high temperatures to make sure the cabinet is not easily breakable!
One size fits all shoes -it can be use for sports shoes, children's shoes, running shoes, Boots, Car, Wardrobe,etc.
Function:drying, eliminate bad odor ! Protecting your shoes from humidity! Your feet have never felt this comfortable before !
After-sales Service:if you're not completely satisfied, then CONTACT US and we will give you a 100% refund within 90 days of purchase.
